body:
Hey guys



Im doing some really basic energy modeling, trying to learn Honeybee from Chris Mackey's tutorial series on Youtube. Im getting an error saying **"No .eio file was found adjacent to the .csv _resultFileAddress.results cannot be read back into grasshopper without this file.".** I see that others have talked about the same issue in the forum earlier, at it has been suggested to uppdate components and ensure contact with EnergyPlus. I've updated all components and established contact with E+, but still get an error. The 



Ill uploud the script and pics of the error message from the report output of the "run energy simulation" -component, and I hope that someone could help me out.
